website_summaries.verdict: We found a lot to like about the B&W MM-1 multimedia speakers, but their $500 price tag gives us pause.
pros: digital connection via USB to computer
cons: audio quality isn't as good when you move out of the sweet spot (three feet away from speakers)
sound is so detailed it makes MP3s and streaming audio of already iffy quality sound worse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desktop speakers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desktop speakers. Some complain that other speakers get louder or deliver more bass output, but neither of those are objectives of the MM-1. Rather these speakers are designed to deliver clean sound in a narrow sound field only inches from your seating position. Who wants to be blasted out of their seat while working on a document/spreadsheet or browsing the web? That's what a full fledged receiver/floor standing setup is for; for which B&W also has numerous great sounding offerings. For a high quality/sounding desktop computer speaker these fit the bill perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Pure magic!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have completely changed my experience with digital music! The clarity and richness of the sound, especially non-amplified polyphonic vocals, like madrigals, are pure magic. I've made only one improvement: put speakers on a thick piece of natural rubber. It helped to get rid of the "barrel" effect of the low frequencies resonating in the space below the desk, which was especially noticeable with orchestral and organ music. Probably, a better quality desk wound not have had this problem :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Prikhojan

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary sound -- transparent and without color. You'll hear ...
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary sound -- transparent and without color. You'll hear things that you haven't heard before. The first pair were DOA but replaced quickly by Amazon. One tiny complaint: they don't automatically come out of standby when the system that they are attached to is powered up. You have to turn them on manually. Why not just detect that the USB is powered?
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers with excellent sound reproduction
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers with excellent sound reproduction. They don't have an attached subwoofer, so bass isn't very punchy, but if you're buying these you're probably not jamming out death metal while doing your excel spreadsheets. The best speakers I've ever used for a computer, but they have really minimized the footprint on my desk and sound fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: CMfromCA

customer_reviews.title: The Rolls-Royce of personal speakers.
customer_reviews.text: The Rolls-Royce of personal speakers. Yes, they're expensive. No, they won't disturb the neighbors. But yes, they sound fabulous. If you are an audiophile, there may not be any alternative.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are really good in the Mid and Hi range
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are really good in the Mid and Hi range. However the reviews say the bass is nice and I like bass a lot if you can't pair these with a sub this speakers are not nearly as good because the bass leaves you still wanting. Personally for the money they are not worth it. If you have a plan to pair this with a sub then I would say you will have one heck of a computer set up. Or if you plan to just using these in the office they should be ok but gamers and other sound people that need the right amount of bass in your music and movies should such elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best computer speakers for classical music.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best computer speakers I have found for listening to classical music. Reasonable bass but the mid and treble ranges are so clear and natural, it's really stunning. String quartets, piano sonatas, choral and vocal music: they all sound clear and natural throughout the dynamic range. You can't expect to blast something but they get plenty loud. The bass does not thump but is clearly resolved. I had a pair of Focal XS computer speakers, which were also very good --and played louder--but I think the MM-1s are clearer and better for classical and jazz music.
customer_reviews.author: Yukio M

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are excellent, however, it would require significant tune up and adjustment to make the best out of it. The position of the power cord could constitute a design flaw. Making them to work with Windows is such a pain. Typical English product, like English woman with thorns, takes time to tame. Just kidding! updates: one that hooks up to the power can be burning hot on the top. Hot enough to fry an egg. updates: The speakers have problem right after the warranty expires, it still plays, but when the computer enters screensaver, the speakers will stop playing. Tech support is inconsistent, one guy says send it in, the other says no.
customer_reviews.author: H. X. Li

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely speakers. The sound is crisp and clear. It is transparent, so as to say. If you are looking for highly shaded sound, such as those boosting base sounds etc. this is not that pair. Howevery, if you are looking for tight sound, these speakers are there. Also, there is no software to work with. Just plug them in and they are ready to go. You can select output using audio midi controls in mac, to select between built in sound and these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Gupta

customer_reviews.title: only the best for the best B&W sound system inside throughout the ...
customer_reviews.text: SIMPLY PUT........IN A LEAGUE of THEIR OWN!! Only wish I would of purchased them years ago. B&W I commend you for such crystal clear and incredible sound. Im Looking at purchasing the LEVANTE Maserati and of course, wouldn't you know it......only the best for the best B&W sound system inside, throughout the car. Made my decision even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have been completely surprised and happy with this purchase. The clarity of the speakers are fantastic. An expensive pair of speakers but well worth the price. Setup was nothing more than plugging them into a USB port. The remote is good but not great (lighted buttons would be helpful but would probably be difficult to pull off on such a small remote due to battery life). Because of the quality and sound of these speakers I will consider buying B&W the next time I replace my living room speakers for watching movies/shows.
customer_reviews.author: Big W

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 3 years ago. Currently rocking out and just had a thought about how incredible they sound for the size and decided to come back and leave a review. Such a big balanced sound for such unobtrusive speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great tone. Can pick up nuances like never before ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tone. Can pick up nuances like never before from my computer speakers. Can really pick out the bass lines. If you are looking for a system that can really rock out with thumping bass this is not the one to get however.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kranig

customer_reviews.title: A CRACK IN THE BOTTOM
customer_reviews.text: Good in sound and design and I love it. But THERE IS A CRACK in the bottom of the right box which makes me a little disappointed. Besides, when I touched it, I can feel a protrusion inside. I wonder what it is and whether it will cause any safety problems? If not, it won't bother me. And I hope the B&W can be more careful in inspection in the future.
customer_reviews.author: chao

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. I have them paired with a sub and the results are nice. Not a audiophile system naturally but definitely Hi-Fi from my computer, so sweet.
customer_reviews.author: RGCoomer

customer_reviews.title: An absolute ear candy experience.!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome. Imaging is crisp, base tight with plenty of bottom. No distortion at full volume. A pleasure to listen to for hours leaving no fatigue. These are a WOW listening experience. I'd buy these again in a nanosecond....
customer_reviews.author: billc

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Desktop speakers
customer_reviews.text: I've recently purchased the MM-1s for my MBP. I connected the USB to my Apple Thunderbolt Display. Setup and go took a couple of minutes. These are solid built handsome monitors. Don't expect the 2.1 speakers' extra bass. I mainly listen to Jazz, Blues, Classical and some R&B. I am thrilled by the details in mids and highs. Bass is exactly how it should be. Some may find bass lacking, but I am happy with the music I listen to. These are made for desktop only and I suggest to place the speakers not more than a couple of feet apart to get the best out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Alp Figen

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant, but once I hooked them up and listened to various files, blown away!
customer_reviews.text: These are computer speakers, look great with the with the macbook pro and works flawlessly with OS X. I listen to BASS heavy songs and I was shocked by the sound quality. I love these speakers!
customer_reviews.author: sumofalllfears

customer_reviews.title: Low volume accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time away from home on projects. So I'm staying hotels. After countless hours of research I bought a pair of these. I can't have much volume in my room. These babies sound excellent at low volumes. It is absolutely amazing. They are worth every penny. I haven't had a chance to crank it up but imagine I would like that also. Simply amazing. The Bowers & Wilkins MM-1 can't be beat in that price range.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Really sweet near-field speakers
customer_reviews.text: Really sweet near-field speakers. I am a huge fan of the B&W brand, and these do not disappoint. Running them through a break-in period now, but they only get better as I continue to listen to them.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Frances

customer_reviews.title: I'll probably get a sub because these don't put out the greatest amount of base
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with these speakers. I'll probably get a sub because these don't put out the greatest amount of base, but they're fantastic on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kopacz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: They are small but powerful. And the sound is very clear. I bought them for my husbands computer but we hooked them up to our in-laws TV while visiting and the sound filled the entire family room. Very high quality sound. I love their simple design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Fillmore

customer_reviews.title: Good things comes in small packages
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and small. The sound from these speakers are clear with some high and low base. I love the simple look of their design. Since I have a small room, these speakers are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Parish

customer_reviews.title: Studio reference quality digital speakers.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is consistent with B&W, and so is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: worth to buy speakers. good for PC
customer_reviews.text: "I can hear more details and feel more punch from music. The music is more solid and intense. I can hear the instruments separatly and clearly. I feel like the vocal is singing in my room and the voice is very close to me like it is a live concert. I can play the music louder because the music from the speakers is very solid. The music won't disperse when I turn up the volume."
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe the sound they produce. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the sound they produce. I have been streaming Tidal lossless audio files through the speakers and couldn't ask for more at the $500 price range. These speakers fill my office with clarity, detail, and natural sound that any HiFi audio fan would expect. You don't need a sub, these things produce more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, reconditioned speakers were a fraction of the cost and are not only attractive, but provide an excellent experience.
customer_reviews.author: Karmann Guya

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set for my desk - they're very musical, great for listening to iTunes whilst working, but also great for conferences and editing voice over audio. Planning on getting a second set, to use with an Airport Express as Airplay speakers in the bedroom - still cheaper than a Zepplin and I like having the speakers separate. B&W do make extension cords so you can put the two speakers further apart too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hamilton-Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Regret not getting them sooner. Thank's Apple Store website showing them on the front page!  Got me to check them out on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Best computer speakers I have ever bought. Should have gotten them when B&W released them a few years ago. Better should then my old 2004 Bose and my last 2.1 set.
customer_reviews.author: Mojic@F@mily

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed with these little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with these little speakers. Made a hissing noise for the first hour or so, but that worked it's way out. Sound is ridiculously loud, clear and impressive, plus they look stylish and neat. Slightly larger than I was expecting, but a classy bit of computer audio kit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Speakers Bur Expensive
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are exactly what I expected. The fit my needs when working on projects and I desire nice sounding music in the background.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have never spent this much money on a pair of computer speakers. I took a chance that they would sound as good as the other reviewers posted. And they do, I can't believe how such a small pair of speakers can sound this good. If you want clear and precise sound, then look no further. These are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Full and Rich Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have my new speakers hooked up to my new iPad 2 and they sound great. The music is coming across as rich and full. The sounds coming out of these speakers is filling up my desk and the clarity is great. I was hesitant to spend so much to buy a pair of desktop speakers but have no regret. I expect that I will be using new speakers quite a bit as the sound coming out of them is just too inviting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Audio heaven
customer_reviews.text: Like no other computer speaker. Simply a different level. My wife guessed it was priced over $1000 after she heard it--so in a sense, it was a bargain at $500! Would not only buy it again, but wouldn't even consider any other speaker system for my computer. It's been a long time in this age of compressed digital audio that I've heard music sound this good, and I'm enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: lworwk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Every now and again, you hear speakers that bring out depth in your music you've not heard before so that it's like really hearing a track for the very first time as it was intended to sound. These are such speakers. I consciously make an extra effort to work from home so that I can play music on my home iMac to which the B&W's are connected. They are simply beautiful to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: excellent warm sound
customer_reviews.text: awesome range, fullness, such good reproduction can make lower quality mp3 sound really low quality. Price is totally worth it, you can see where the money went
customer_reviews.author: RYON HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best sounding desktop speakers I have every had for my PC.
customer_reviews.author: Great One

customer_reviews.title: Just pleasure for my ears...
customer_reviews.text: I am a music student and I love listening to high quality audio on my computer. Before I got the MM-1s, I was a big Bose fan. Since I got them I would never return to Bose. The sound is so natural and pure, powerful and free of that huge bass some sub-woofers produce damaging the overall sound. Completely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moramour

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely surprise for its small size. Increditably well balance in regards to tonality. You can hear a wide pitch range.
customer_reviews.author: lattedude

customer_reviews.title: Great computer speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for your computer. Light, open sound with lots of definition. They sound best when your ears are similar in height to the speakers and you are seated between them. Bass is limited because of the small enclosure, but I don't mind at all. Gave a pair to my daughter for her birthday to take to college. She plays them all the time, and boasts to her friends "my speakers are better than your speakers!"
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Banks

customer_reviews.title: These speakers replaced Bose companion 5 and are far superior in their richness in overall sound quality as in ...
customer_reviews.text: These speakers replaced Bose companion 5 and are far superior in their richness in overall sound quality as in all B and W speakers
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Small size but very powerful and clear sound. The bass is amazing, it works perfectly with in my bedroom of 20m2. I love it, thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Zhu Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend's birthday and he absolutely loved them! One of the best speakers around. They are very clear sounding and designed very elegantly and cute! I would recommend for anyone looking to buy some expensive speakers, or decently priced anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It 's so perfect that makes you forget the money you spend . The left speaker is a little hot on operation , I hope this is normal !
customer_reviews.author: Michail Kantios

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound for your computer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a busted Bose Companion 3 Series 1 speakers. While the Bose delivered more bass, it was just more, not richer or better. These speakers sound crisp and taught and have great resolution at low to mid volume. Anything more you have to be standing a few feet from the speakers, they get loud.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel CJ

customer_reviews.title: Think hifi.
customer_reviews.text: B&W MM-1 exceeds my expectation on PC speakers. I would definitely make the same choice next time. I wish it is robust enough - think lifetime warranty too.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: I love this speakers
customer_reviews.text: I am not good at english.It's difficult to me to written too much words. I just wanna tell you: I love this speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Wang

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and style. Even had nice bass. The problem was static and hiss when not playing sound. The hiss was present with all sources. For computer speakers thats a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy J

customer_reviews.title: thanks B&W for this fantastic loudspeakers.
customer_reviews.text: ... thanks B&W for this fantastic loudspeakers.. i love it!..
customer_reviews.author: Enrico Egli

customer_reviews.title: needs a subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: incredible sound for desktop speakers but I would prefer something with a little more low end for this kind of money. I suppose my downstairs neighbor loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound with limited range
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are pricey but if you spend a lot time in front of your PC and you love music they are great! But if you walk away the sound degrades quickly. Be warned, stay close and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Maczka

customer_reviews.title: Very good !
customer_reviews.text: Real Hi-Fi for a computer speaker ! Frequency response is well balanced throughout wide volume range (except above 80~90 % of total power). Excellent built quality. Would be more powerful for the price.
customer_reviews.author: H. Yoneda

customer_reviews.title: and I'm much happier.
customer_reviews.text: I found the MM-1 to be very detailed when it came to my music, however the lack of any bass made me return them. I have the Audioengine A5+ with their dac now, and I'm much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Franz Council

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding detail and accuracy! I did add a subwoofer to complement below 100HZ!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best, feels like someone singing in front of you!
customer_reviews.author: Y. liu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. The only con for me, is that they are meant to be set up, let's say with your computer. Moving them to another place in the house, would be a little bit of a hassle with all those cables. In other words, they are not portable at all. Other than that, I am extremely happy with them. The sound is really bright and have great volume. Top notch quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth URIBE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality, but the remote is not working. I had to buy a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Lelouch Britannia

customer_reviews.title: Best for pc speaker but not perfect for audiophile
customer_reviews.text: Definitely this is the best pc speaker available now. But this is not an audiophile speaker. This has good high and bass but I feel there is some void in middle. But, overall, this is the best 5/5 as a pc speaker on your desk. I hope they make a new premium version of this, making this larger and better as cm or above quality at $2000. Audiophile quality with super sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Sungryong Hong

customer_reviews.title: 9 OUT OF 10.
customer_reviews.text: Great clear crisp sound but bass is not there. Was not expecting a huge base sound could of been better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: mm1音质很棒,赞一个!很多方面都显示了它高品质的音质,值得去买一个回家细细品尝
customer_reviews.text: Mm1 sound quality is great, praise a! Many ways shows the high quality quality, it is worth to buy a home for tasting 作为一个中国人,在国外能买到中国制造的产品,真的很自豪! 先说回音质吧,听古典、轻摇滚乐,还有轻音乐真的很好,细节体现尤为明显,但听流行乐我还是建议大家不要去买,毕竟可能是音箱太少没低音炮轰鸣声的缘故,所以效果体现不出来,但总体还是很好。 大部分歌曲中音圆,低音稍缺,高音很美,如果是住家还是建议买bose C5。我觉得模拟5.1环绕声会达到震撼的感觉,至于这款mm1音箱则和我们耳机差不多,只是放大版,所以听出来的细腻度会很明显,但就如所有评论所说,它只适合在20平米房间去播放,而并非每个角落都能听到,这或许就是它为数不多的缺点。 另外我认为它应该改进的,就是连接线太多,如果能少点就更容易达到方便携带的目的了。
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead out the box.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to setting up my new speakers and I'm hugely disappointed. I followed all the instructions (there were none but I found on the web) and they simply don't work - no power. These are not inexpensive speakers. I shouldn't have to deal with this crap.
customer_reviews.author: b1lynch

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a pair of these speakers. The sound quality is very good, but there are serious problems with the system. The remote works about half of the time. At times the remote lets me increase the volume but most of the time I'm not able to increase or decrease the volume using the remote or do it manualy. This is horrible considering these speakers cost $500! Also the instructions for set up are inadaquete. No "trouble shooting" options are included should you have problems. Still waiting for a response from the company to my inquiry....nothing yet. My advice is to avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: gill

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins MM-1 Hi-Fi Computer Speakers with Built-in DAC, Black
product_meta.description:
Style:Hi-Fi SpeakersTrue Hi-Fi speakers, shrunk to fit on your desktop. 

MM-1 speakers are not like other computer monitors. Built with attention to detail and craftsmanship, they transform your computer into a Hi-Fi sound system, using technology taken from some of the best-sounding studio speakers in the world. To match the most stylish of desktop environments, they look great too. The perfect companion for desktops or laptops, enjoy your computer audio as never before. 

There’s an art to producing big sounds from small speakers. Digital Signal Processing (DSP) constantly adjusts sound balance to keep bass effects powerful and music sounding rich and detailed, no matter how loud you play it. Along with built-in DSP, the MM-1 takes audio straight from USB and handles digital to analog conversion itself. This cuts out the soundcard, so you'll always get the best audio quality, independent of the computer output. 

Computers belong at the heart of your home and at the heart of your home entertainment. Today's PCs and Macs are used to store and stream movies, high-resolution music and more. MM-1 comes in a small package but it brings true Hi-Fi quality sound to your desktop, so the multimedia content from your computer sounds its very best.
feature_bullets: TRUE HIFI COMPUTER SPEAKERS - The MM-1 brings true hi-fi quality sound to your desktop for the first time, giving your computer the audio it deserves
NEAR-FIELD SWEET SPOT - The MM-1 computer audio speakers are designed to have a near-field sweet spot, meaning the best sound is a few feet from your monitor - right where you're sitting

BUILT-IN DAC FOR QUALITY SOUND - Stream audio directly from your computer via USB, which converts the signal from digital to analog internally. The MM-1 also feature an aux line-in socket for connecting other devices.

FULL-RANGE SOUND - Most computer speakers have just one drive unit to handle all frequencies. MM-1 has two drivers, one dedicated to bass and midrange frequencies and another for treble. It sounds like a Hi-Fi speaker, because it is one.

2 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY - Bowers & Wilkins' MM1 Hi-Fi Speakers come with a 2-year limited warranty only when purchased from an authorized dealer including Amazon.com (indicated by ships from and sold by Amazon.com). Please Note: Kindly refer the Instructional Video before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
